item.title: Announcement
item.description: Registration Link Correction! The intranet registration link for the Funds Management Training Session on September 18th, 2025 is incorrect. Please click Training Session - Funds Management<https://events.teams.microsoft.com/event/cb9beceb-e3c9-48f9-8a5d-fedbaa93b876@1594fdae-a1d9-4405-915d-011467234338> to be directed to the appropriate registration page. We apologize for any inconveniences this has caused.
